heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_ancient_apparition
heroes.bio_loc: Kaldr, the Ancient Apparition, is an image projected from outside time. He springs from the cold, infinite void that both predates the universe and awaits its end. Kaldr is, Kaldr was, Kaldr shall be...and what we perceive, powerful as it appears to us, is but the faintest faded echo of the true, eternal Kaldr. Some believe that as the cosmos ages and approaches its final moments, the brightness and power of Kaldr will also intensify--that the Ancient Apparition will grow younger and stronger as eternity's end draws nigh. His grip of ice will bring all matter to a stop, his image will cast a light too terrible to behold. An Apparition no longer!
heroes.hype_loc: Able to launch a powerful blast of damaging ice across the battlefield, Ancient Apparition threatens to shatter weakened enemies wherever they are. Slowing enemies as he enhances his allies' effectiveness in battle, he is a constant threat to his foes.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Launches a powerful icy blast from anywhere on the map

facets.description_loc: Ancient Apparition's abilities reduce the enemy's Strength.
facets.name: ancient_apparition_bone_chill

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_cold_feet
abilities.desc_loc: Places Death Rime Stacks on an enemy that can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
facets_loc: Cold Feet applies its Death Rime damage in an area around the target.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_ice_vortex
abilities.desc_loc: Creates a vortex of icy energy that applies Death Rime Stacks and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.
abilities.lore_loc: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
notes_loc: Provides vision in a small area where it is placed.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_chilling_touch
abilities.desc_loc: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range and heavy magic damage. Applies a Death Rime Stack that lasts for %duration% seconds. Additionally applies a %slow%%% slow for %slow_duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.
abilities.scepter_loc: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by %bonus_AbilityManaCost%%%.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_death_rime
abilities.desc_loc: Ancient Apparition's abilities apply Death Rime Stacks on enemies. Death Rime slows enemies' movement speed and deals damage over time.
facets_loc: Each Death Rime Stack also reduces the enemy's Strength.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_ice_blast
abilities.desc_loc: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, gaining Death Rime Stacks and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.
abilities.lore_loc: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
notes_loc: Upon cast, this ability is replaced by Release, used to stop the tracer on the target area.
The area of effect is %radius_min% + %radius_grow%*TimeTraveled, capped at %radius_max%.
Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter.
The shatter effect doesn't work on illusions.
The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain, except Sunder, Time Lapse and Supernova.
abilities.shard_loc: Freezes enemies hit with the current level of Cold Feet for %cold_feet_stun_duration_pct%%% of the duration.
